Flag Meaning: Blank - No quality control (QC) has been performed
Good - QC has been performed: record appears correct
Doubtful - QC has been performed: record appears doubtful
Erroneous - QC has been perfromed: record appears erroneous
Changes - The record has been changed as a result of QC
Acceptable - QC has been performed: record seems inconsistent with other records
Off Position - There is a problem with the buoy position or mooring. Data may still be useful.
